Description:
*Steps:* User enters valid email and password.
*Expected Result:* User receives JWT token and is redirected to the Dashboard.

*Steps:* User enters incorrect password.
*Expected Result:* System displays "Invalid credentials" error message, access is denied.

*Steps:* Access token expires; app performs a background request.
*Expected Result:* Token is refreshed automatically without logging the user out.

*Steps:* User clicks "Logout" button.
*Expected Result:* Token is removed from secure storage, user redirected to login screen.

*Steps:* Attempt to access /api/v1/events without a token.
*Expected Result:* Backend returns 401 Unauthorized, app redirects to login.

*Steps:* Fill all required fields (name, future date, slots > 0).
*Expected Result:* Event is created successfully and appears in "My Events" list.

*Steps:* Attempt to create an event with yesterday's date.
*Expected Result:* Creation is blocked, validation error is displayed.

*Steps:* Change the address of an existing event.
*Expected Result:* Address updates on the list AND the map pin moves to the new location.

*Steps:* Organizer manually adds a player (e.g., "John Doe").
*Expected Result:* Available slot count decreases by 1.

*Steps:* Organizer deletes an event.
*Expected Result:* Event is removed from all player lists and the map.

*Steps:* Click "Join" on an event with available spots (e.g., 5/10).
*Expected Result:* Status changes to "JOINED", slot count updates (e.g., 6/10).

*Steps:* Click "Leave" or "Resign".
*Expected Result:* Status changes to "NOT JOINED", spot becomes free for others.

*Steps:* Rapidly click "Join" button multiple times.
*Expected Result:* System prevents duplicate requests; user is added only once.

*Steps:* Attempt to join an event where 10/10 slots are taken.
*Expected Result:* User is added to the WAITLIST, not the main list.

*Steps:* Event is full. User A joins, followed by User B.
*Expected Result:* User A is assigned "Waitlist #1", User B is assigned "Waitlist #2".

*Steps:* A participant from the main list leaves a full event.
*Expected Result:* User A (Waitlist #1) is automatically promoted to the Main List.

*Steps:* User A is promoted from Waitlist #1 to Main List.
*Expected Result:* User B moves from "Waitlist #2" to "Waitlist #1".

*Steps:* User A (Waitlist #1) leaves the waitlist.
*Expected Result:* User B (Waitlist #2) moves up to become "Waitlist #1".

*Steps:* Last spot available. Two users click "Join" at the exact same millisecond.
*Expected Result:* Backend atomicity ensures only one user joins Main List, the other goes to Waitlist.

*Steps:* Create a series (e.g., "Tuesdays", "Weekly", "4 occurrences").
*Expected Result:* System generates 4 independent events with identical parameters.

*Steps:* Change time/details for the 3rd event in a series only.
*Expected Result:* Events 1, 2, and 4 remain unchanged. Only the 3rd event is updated.

*Steps:* Click "Cancel Series".
*Expected Result:* Future events are not generated (or removed, depending on spec).

*Steps:* Open the map view.
*Expected Result:* Event markers are visible in the user's vicinity.

*Steps:* User joins an event via list view, then returns to map.
*Expected Result:* The slot count in the map popup is updated reflecting the change.

*Steps:* View map area with multiple events at the same location.
*Expected Result:* Multiple markers are handled via clustering or a list popup.

*Steps:* Load map view.
*Expected Result:* Finished or past events are not visible on the map.

*Steps:* Access application via http:// protocol.
*Expected Result:* Automatic redirect to https://.

*Steps:* Send request to /health endpoint.
*Expected Result:* Response status 200 OK (Liveness/Readiness confirmed).

*Steps:* Force backend to return 500 Error.
*Expected Result:* Mobile app handles error gracefully (no crash), displays generic error message.
